sentences.en: A golden wedding is the fiftieth anniversary of a marriage.
sentences.cn: 金婚是结婚五十周年纪念日.

sentences.en: Dartmouth College just marked the fiftieth anniversary of that summer study.
sentences.cn: 在那个夏季研究上,Dartmouth大学正好是第五十周年校庆.

sentences.en: He retired in 1970, on his fiftieth birthday.
sentences.cn: 他在1970年自己50岁生日时退了休。

sentences.en: In 1894 all Vienna honored the fiftieth anniversary of Strauss as a conductor.
sentences.cn: 1894年全维也纳举行了施特劳斯担任乐队指挥50年庆祝会.

sentences.en: In 1929 a great celebration was held on his fiftieth birthday in Berlin.
sentences.cn: 1929年,在他五十寿辰的时候,人们在柏林举行大的庆祝会.

sentences.en: It doesn't matter tomorrow if they come in first or fiftieth.
sentences.cn: 他们明天得第一名还是第五十名都不重要。

sentences.en: It'sounded like the very thing for a fiftieth － anniversary celebration.
sentences.cn: 这看来很像是一次庆祝金婚的盛典.

sentences.en: This new method was brought into existence in the fiftieth.
sentences.cn: 这一新方法出现于五十年代.

words.tran_cn: 第十五的；十五分之一的
五十的；五十个的；众多的
五十；五十个；编号为50的东西

trans.tran_cn: 第五十的，五十分之一的
